name: Masamune ( 武士 )
description: Masamune is known for its extreme violence and unforgiveness of enemies, and is known as one of the scariest samurai in history. Having lost his right eye due to smallpox as a child, he had to work harder to become known as a great fighter. Massamone initially lost several battles, but then won all the battles and became very famous. There is a story that tells: during the events, Masamoneh's father was kidnapped by a group of enemies of his tribe, and in retaliation, Masamoneh slaughtered all of them and even killed his father during these struggles! He later became known as the chief of the Tomiotomo Hideyoshi and Tokugawa Layesu tribes.
